sys_remote_update_set.description:
This update set creates: - 3 new tables extended from dl_matcher - list layouts, form layouts, roles, acls, ui policies all included - a ui action - a ui page - 2 script includes (one client callable) - system properties to hold the size of the boxes and spacing on the graphs
The functionality is: - in the "Record Graph Lookup" add configuration for a table that you want to see graphs for - in the related lists "Upstream Relationships" and "Downstream Relationships" add the relationship configuration - you may have multiple Record Graph Lookup records for the same table - you may have as many up or downstream relationship as you want - you must have at least one upstream and at least one downstream relationship that have their parent configuration set to "Base Record" - Once the configuration is complete go to any record in the Base Record Table you set on your Record Graph Lookup and there is a UI Action in the Related Links section "Show record graph" - Clicking the link opens a modal window showing the available Record Graph Lookup configurations for this table - Click a link to be taken to the graph
sys_remote_update_set.name: Record Graph

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_5c3004fe97d85110be4abfb3f153afae
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.RecordGraphAjax</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>RecordGraphAjax</name><script><![CDATA[var RecordGraphAjax = Class.create();
RecordGraphAjax.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
	type: 'RecordGraphAjax',

	getHTML: function(){
		var table = this.getParameter("sysparm_table");
		var id = this.getParameter("sysparm_id");
		return new global.RecordGraphUtils().getHTML(table,id);
	},

	getRelationships: function(){
		var table = this.getParameter("sysparm_table");
		var id = this.getParameter("sysparm_id");
		var children = this.getParameter("sysparm_children");
		return new global.RecordGraphUtils().getRelationships(table,id,children);
	},

	dotWalk: function(){
		var config = this.getParameter("sysparm_config");
		return new global.RecordGraphUtils().dotWalk(config);
	},

	buildGraph: function(){
		var table = this.getParameter("sysparm_table");
		var id = this.getParameter("sysparm_id");
		var configId = this.getParameter("sysparm_config_id");
		return new global.RecordGraphUtils().buildGraph(table, id, configId);
	},
	
	getM2MTable: function(){
		var table = this.getParameter("sysparm_table");
		var field = this.getParameter("sysparm_field");
		return new global.RecordGraphUtils().getM2MTable(table,field);
	}

});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-06-28 15:14:24</sys_created_on><sys_id>5c3004fe97d85110be4abfb3f153afae</sys_id><sys_mod_count>22</sys_mod_count><sys_name>RecordGraphAjax</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_5c3004fe97d85110be4abfb3f153afae</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-07-07 09:56:13</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
